author: Jovem Pan
title: PGR pede manutenção da prisão dos irmãos Brazão e Rivaldo Barbosa
text:
Notícias > Política > PGR pede manutenção da prisão dos irmãos Brazão e Rivaldo Barbosa PGR pede manutenção da prisão dos irmãos Brazão e Rivaldo Barbosa Defesa dos acusados havia solicitado a soltura, alegando que não há perigo de fuga e que medidas menos severas poderiam ser aplicadas
Por Jovem Pan 27/06/2024 20h04 Wilton Junior/Estadão Conteúdo
DF - OPERAÇÃO MURDER INC/PF/IRMÃOS BRAZÃO/PRISÃO/PRESÍDIO FEDERAL - POLÍTICA - O deputado federal Chiquinho Brazão (União Brasil-RJ), um dos suspeitos de mandar matar a vereadora Marielle Franco, desembarca de avião da Polícia Federal no hangar da PF no Aeroporto de Brasília, na tarde deste domingo, 24. Também vieram no voo o irmão de Chiquinho, Domingos Brazão, conselheiro do Tribunal de Contas do Rio de Janeiro (TCE-RJ), e o delegado Rivaldo Barbosa, suspeito de atrapalhar as investigações. Os três vão ser encaminhados para o presídio federal da capital. Foto: WILTON JUNIOR/ESTADÃO CONTEÚDO AGE20240324095 - 24/03/2024 - 18:46
A Procuradoria-Geral da República (PGR) enviou um parecer ao Supremo Tribunal Federal (STF) nesta quinta-feira (27) solicitando a manutenção da prisão dos irmãos Domingos e Chiquinho Brazão, juntamente com o ex-chefe da Polícia Civil do Rio de Janeiro, Rivaldo Barbosa. Eles estão detidos desde março deste ano, sob a acusação de envolvimento no assassinato da vereadora Marielle Franco e do motorista Anderson Gomes, em 2018. De acordo com o vice-procurador Hidenburgo Chateaubriand, a prisão dos acusados deve ser mantida para garantir a ordem pública e o andamento das investigações. A defesa dos acusados havia solicitado a soltura, alegando que não há perigo de fuga e que medidas menos severas poderiam ser aplicadas.
Siga o canal da Jovem Pan News e receba as principais notícias no seu WhatsApp! WhatsApp O pedido de revogação da prisão foi encaminhado ao ministro Alexandre de Moraes , relator do caso no STF. No entanto, o procurador ressaltou que os elementos que levaram à prisão dos acusados permanecem inalterados, não havendo motivo para a reversão das decisões judiciais. Na terça-feira (18), o Supremo Tribunal Federal decidiu tornar réus o conselheiro do Tribunal de Contas do Rio de Janeiro, Domingos Brazão, seu irmão Chiquinho Brazão, o ex-chefe da Polícia Civil do Rio de Janeiro Rivaldo Barbosa e o major da Polícia Militar Ronald Paulo de Alves Pereira. Todos são acusados de homicídio e organização criminosa no caso Marielle Franco e Anderson Gomes.
Leia também Ministério Público Eleitoral se manifesta contra pedido do União Brasil para cassar Chiquinho Brazão Sindicato de agentes penitenciários denuncia que facção já encomendou a morte de Ronnie Lessa em presídio de SP Leia também Ministério Público Eleitoral se manifesta contra pedido do União Brasil para cassar Chiquinho Brazão Sindicato de agentes penitenciários denuncia que facção já encomendou a morte de Ronnie Lessa em presídio de SP
*Reportagem produzida com auxílio de IA

author: ACCESSWIRE
title: Physiowell Physiotherapy and Chiropractic Center: Achieving Peak Performance: The Role of Physiowell in Enhancing Athletic Performance
text:
The Role of Physiotherapy in Athletic Performance
DUBAI, UAE / ACCESSWIRE / December 26, 2024 / In sports, every split second counts, an inch more might make all the difference, and this calls for enhanced athletic performance. Athletes always go beyond the limit, but that in itself heightens the chance of injury. This is where Physiowell comes in: a premier provider of physiotherapy for athletes in the UAE, working assiduously to help athletes realize peak performance with little chance of injury.
The Role of Physiotherapy in Athletic Performance
Physiotherapy is important in enhancing the flexibility, strength and endurance of an athlete. Consistent sessions will help them rectify imbalance, promote mobility and strengthen parts that are prone to strain, hence causing general athletic performance enhancement. Besides this, sports physiotherapy UAE forms a critical part of injury prevention for athletes, where methods of preventing common problems such as sprains, muscle tears and overuse injuries are offered to them.
How Physiowell Enhances Athletic Performance
At Physiowell, athletes benefit from cutting-edge sports physiotherapy in the UAE tailored to their needs. From elite professionals to weekend warriors, Physiowell team creates personalized treatment plans targeting athlete performance improvement.
Manual therapy, dry needling and therapeutic exercises are some of the techniques used to ensure holistic care. Physiowell integrates sports-specific conditioning programs that hone agility, endurance and power in athletes desiring peak athletic performance.
Preventing Sports Injuries With Physiotherapy
More than being just a setback, it can end an athlete's career altogether. Physiowell relies on prevention and concentrates on the importance of maintaining a healthy athlete. Physiotherapy for sports injuries at Physiowell educates athletes about proper warm-up routines, targeted stretches and muscle conditioning techniques that prepare them and keep their minds at ease regarding their physical well-being.
Whether it is common injuries such as ACL tears or the prevention of repetitive stress injuries, Physiowell's concept of sports injury physiotherapy aims that athletes keep their edge.
Accelerating Recovery and Rehabilitation
When injuries occur, there is a need for quick and effective recovery. Rehabilitation programs by Physiowell are focused on helping an athlete return to work as fast and safely as possible. Recovery will be comprehensive by employing modern techniques, including electrotherapy, dry needling and manual therapy.
Real-life success stories from athletes treated at Physiowell underscore their commitment to excellence.
Tailored Programs for Peak Performance
Achieving and maintaining athletic performance enhancement requires consistent care. Physiowell's tailored programs go beyond injury treatment, focusing on optimizing performance. Their ongoing support ensures athletes continuously improve, whether preparing for a marathon or excelling in team sports.
Conclusion
Physiowell revolutionizes the way athletes pursue excellence. Incorporating professional physical therapy for athletes into their routines enables them to enhance performance, reduce injury proneness and accelerate recovery. Now, are you ready to take your performance to the next level?
Enhance your athletic journey with Physiowell's professional physiotherapy services. Book an appointment today .

author: financialcontent.com
title: Holiday Season Marred by Ongoing conflicts and Strife | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Maybe a Message from Above Can Offer Hope LOS ANGELES, CA - December 28, 2023 - “Peace on Earth, good will toward men” is a catchphrase tossed about often during the holiday season, but it might sound like nothing more than wishful thinking as difficult conflicts continue to rage in Ukraine and Gaza … even the land of Jesus’ birth (Galilee back then, now Israel) is engaged in unrest.
And most of those in the U.S. probably aren’t even aware that civil conflicts are also ongoing currently in Afghanistan, Central African Republic, Ethiopia, Libya, Mali, Somalia, South Sudan and Syria.
Where to turn for signs of hope? The late Dr. Pieter Noomen, a psychotherapist and senior minister of three Protestant churches, might suggest heeding the words of what he called the Real Reality, the name he used for what others might call Allah, the Holy Father, Jehovah or any of the other many names for God.
Dr. Noomen died in 2019, but he left behind many writings of what he said were his own personal conversations with the Real Reality, and they remain available today, free for anyone to access, at his website, www.wordsforall.org
Most of those writings are what Dr. Noomen said were direct Quote: s from the Real Reality, and this is one such Quote: pertaining to war:
"On earth, in individuals and in nature, so much pure energy is siphoned off and used for destructive purposes like hurting, destroying and killing. The substance of life's nature – as bubbling with joy and creative passion – is so fragmented that it is an alien concept for many people. Earth is indeed 'planet Zero,' hanging in an 'impossible' position between the truth and its denial. Fire, literally and figuratively, is used by people to wage wars, to intimidate, to impose their will by force. In nature, it is barely contained and, in many ways, remains a threat. This is also what goes on in people's internals …
All the horrors and cruelties of people killing people, how can we not be shocked, hurt, saddened and, for many, scared?”
And this, according to Dr. Noomen, was the Real Reality’s own answer:
“Only one reaction is a foolproof contribution to stopping the madness of violence: It is rigorously cleansing our own personal thinking of anything negative. That way, we create and carry inside us a lasting, untouchable pocket of peace."
The question remains whether humankind will get the message in time to find that pocket of peace.
Dr. Noomen was a staff member of a Los Angeles metropolitan church, where he engaged in helping with mental health issues like suicide prevention and hospice. His writings remain free for anyone on this website: (www.wordsforall.org).
An example of Dr. Noomen’s “Words of Wisdom,” one of the many categories on his website:
"In order to be a decent and creative person, the best possible, we don't need religious ceremonies or symbols – Christmas, Ramadan, worship services, prayer routines, etc. … Yet religion 'can be fun' if it stimulates caring attitudes, healing actions and a positive togetherness."
 Ascot Media Group, Inc.
Contact Person: Gloria Gonzalez
Email: Send Email
Phone: 281.333.3507
Address: Post Office Box 2394
City: Friendswood
State: TX 77549
Country: United States
Website: http://www.ascotmedia.com/

author: Georgina Cutler
title: Tesla driver 'using autopilot' charged after car 'lurched forward' and killed motorcyclist
text: Published: 25/04/2024- 21:23 Updated: 25/04/2024- 22:15 Don't Miss Most Read Trending on GB News A Tesla driver has been charged with vehicular homicide after his car in autopilot mode killed a motorcyclist, documents show. The vehicle collided with motorcyclist Jeffrey Nissen at around 3.45 pm on Friday in Maltby - a suburban area about 15 miles outside of Seattle. The 56-year-old Tesla driver told emergency services that the vehicle in autopilot mode "lurched forward as it accelerated and collided with the motorcycle in front of him." Court documents also stated that the driver admitted to having one drink before the crash, but passed field and blood tests. A Tesla driver has been charged with vehicular homicide after his car in autopilot mode killed a motorcyclist, documents showGetty The driver of a 2022 Tesla Model S told a Washington State Patrol trooper that he had looked at his phone while the Tesla was moving, Fox News reports. The trooper wrote in a probable-cause document: "The next thing he knew there was a bang and the vehicle lurched forward as it accelerated and collided with the motorcycle in front of him." According to the document, the driver was arrested for investigation of vehicular homicide "based on the admitted inattention to driving, while on Autopilot mode, and the distraction of the cell phone while moving forward, putting trust in the machine to drive for him." Authorities said they have not yet verified whether Autopilot was in use at the time of the incident. LATEST DEVELOPMENTS: Washington State Patrol Capt. Deion Glover said: "We have not gotten that far yet. It’s very early stages of the investigation." Nissen, 28, died at the scene after he was ejected from the bike before being run over by the Tesla. His death comes four months after US auto safety regulators pressured Tesla into recalling more than 2 million vehicles to fix a defective system which is supposed to ensure drivers pay attention while using Autopilot. Tesla states on its website that Autopilot is intended "for use with a fully attentive driver, who has their hands on the wheel and is prepared to take over at any moment." The driver of a 2022 Tesla Model S told a Washington State Patrol trooper that he had looked at his phone while the Tesla was moving, Fox News reports (stock image) Getty It is unknown whether the Tesla involved in the Washington collision had the software update specified in the recall. Speaking about Nissen's death, his sister Jenessa Fagerlie said: "[Jeff] was such a loving person, such a loving uncle. He loved his nieces and nephews. "We were hoping someday that he would have kids, but he got taken too soon," she told FOX 13.

author: Lanededbz Pages
title: Exterminators Roanoke: Advanced Techniques for Pest Removal and Prevention
text:
Expert Pest Control Solutions: Protect Your Home or Business
In today's hectic world, the requirement for specialist pest control services has actually become significantly important for both companies and property owners. Dealing with bugs can be a challenging task, needing a detailed understanding of different insect species and their behaviors. Whether it's dealing with pests, termites, or rats, a professional insect control company can provide customized techniques tailored to your particular demands.
The Relevance of Professional Insect Control
Specialist bug control is essential for efficiently taking care of and stopping problems in both commercial and household residential properties. Parasite problems can trigger significant damages to structures, endanger the wellness and safety of owners, and negatively impact the online reputation and productivity of services. While there are do-it-yourself approaches available, they often drop short in supplying long-lasting solutions. Working with expert pest control solutions makes sure that the invasion is handled promptly and successfully, lessening the risks and prospective damage.
Among the main advantages of specialist pest control is the experience and knowledge that technicians offer the table. They are trained to recognize different sorts of pests, recognize their actions, and determine the most suitable treatment methods. This enables them to establish personalized methods customized to the specific requirements of each home. Specialist pest control business have actually access to specialized tools, equipment, and items that are not easily available to the general public. These resources enable them to efficiently get rid of bugs and protect against future problems.
Additionally, expert insect control services offer recurring tracking and maintenance to guarantee that the infestation does not persist. This aggressive method helps to recognize and address any kind of possible concerns prior to they end up being major troubles. Regular inspections and therapies can likewise help to recognize early signs of problems, permitting quick intervention and preventing the bugs from triggering extensive damages.
Common Pest Problems and Solutions
Typical insect troubles can present a substantial threat to the wellness of your home or business. From rats to pests, these insects can trigger damages to frameworks, infect food, and spread diseases. It is vital to identify and attend to these concerns promptly to lessen the possible harm they can trigger.
One usual insect issue is the visibility of rats such as rats and mice. These pests can chew via wires, insulation, and also walls, triggering extensive damage to your residential or commercial property. Furthermore, they can infect food with their droppings and pee, positioning wellness threats to you and your household or consumers.
Insects are another typical bug trouble that can afflict both business and property rooms. Termites, cockroaches, and ants are just a few instances of insects that can infest your building.
To attend to these pest issues, it is a good idea to seek expert insect control remedies. Parasite control experts have the knowledge, experience, and devices to successfully determine and remove parasite problems. They can use a variety of approaches such as capturing, baiting, and chemical treatments to eliminate insects and stop their return.
Benefits of Employing a Parasite Control Company
Employing a parasite control company provides many benefits for businesses and property owners alike. Among the vital benefits is the proficiency and experience that these experts offer the table. Insect control business have actually educated specialists that are educated concerning different sorts of parasites and the most efficient methods to remove them. They can promptly identify the resource of the infestation and carry out targeted solutions to remove the problem.
One more advantage of working with a parasite control business is the assurance of lasting parasite avoidance. These specialists not just remove existing parasites however additionally supply safety nets to guarantee that the invasion does not reoccur. They can use routine examinations and therapies to maintain your building pest-free.
In addition, employing a pest control firm can save you effort and time - pest control companies Roanoke. Handling an insect problem can be lengthy and challenging, specifically if you lack the essential expertise and equipment. By hiring experts, you can focus on your everyday activities while leaving the bug control tasks in qualified hands
Lastly, employing a parasite control company can aid safeguard your health and safety. Pests can bring diseases and position wellness risks to animals and human beings. Pest control specialists are educated to handle harmful chemicals and utilize

Expert Bug Control Strategies and techniques
Bug control service technicians employ a range of effective techniques and techniques to eliminate parasites and safeguard your home or service. These specialists are educated to recognize and address pest infestations using the most risk-free and proper techniques offered.
One commonly used technique is using pesticides. Bug control professionals have accessibility to an array of chemical pesticides that target specific parasites while minimizing injury to people and the setting. These chemicals are applied tactically, targeting the areas where pests are most likely to pass or stay through.
Along with chemical pesticides, bug control professionals likewise utilize non-chemical methods to control parasites. This consists of the usage of traps, lures, and exemption methods. Traps and baits work for recording and removing insects like rodents and pests. Exemption techniques entail securing off entry factors and carrying out steps to stop pests from entering your building.
Integrated Bug Management (IPM) is an additional method that pest control experts utilize. IPM concentrates on long-term bug prevention as opposed to simply removal - Roanoke pest control. It includes a mix of approaches such as regular examinations, tracking, and executing preventative actions to minimize the threat of future problems
Guaranteeing Long-Term Bug Prevention
To efficiently preserve a pest-free setting, it is essential to implement detailed and aggressive steps that go past typical removal approaches. While eliminating bugs is necessary, avoiding them from entering your properties in the first place is just as essential. Long-lasting parasite prevention includes a combination of methods focused on eliminating
this websiteattractants, blocking entrance factors, and regular maintenance.
One key aspect of lasting insect avoidance is recognizing and getting rid of attractants. Parasites are frequently drawn to water, sanctuary, and food.
One more important action is to seal off entrance points that pests can make use of to get to your building. Examine your structure thoroughly for splits, spaces, or openings in wall surfaces, windows, doors, and foundations. Usage caulk, weatherstripping, or various other proper materials to secure these spaces and prevent bugs from getting in.
Normal maintenance is likewise crucial for lasting insect prevention. Conduct regular examinations to determine any kind of signs of parasite activity or possible susceptabilities. Implement an aggressive insect control strategy that consists of normal tracking, proper waste administration, and the usage of safety nets such as baits or traps.
Verdict
In conclusion, professional bug control services are vital for protecting homes and services from common insect issues. Employing a respectable parasite control company offers numerous benefits, such as specialized methods and techniques that effectively remove parasites and ensure long-term avoidance. By utilizing professional services, people can maintain a pest-free environment and guard their building.

author: Álvaro Vega Cid
title: Los Reyes Magos no quieren mojarse en Andalucía
text:
Laura Ramírez/Fermín Cabanillas | Huelva/Sevilla (EFE).- La previsión de lluvias intensas en la zona occidental de Andalucía en la tarde del 5 y 6 de enero ha llevado a numerosas localidades de Huelva y Sevilla a adelantar a la tarde del 4 de enero sus cabalgatas de Reyes Magos . Se trata de evitar que los cortejos sufran las inclemencias del tiempo o tengan que suspenderse.
Es una situación que ya se vivió en la provincia sevillana en 2018. Entonces, la mayoría de sus cortejos se pasaron a la tarde del día 4, mientras que se mantuvo la de la capital. En este caso fue un recorrido que se vio alterado por la lluvia en muchos tramos.
Hasta las 12:00 horas de este jueves habían anunciado el adelanto al 4 de enero las localidades sevillanas de Alcalá de Guadaíra, Huévar del Aljarafe, Carmona, Aznalcóllar, Bormujos, Arahal, La Puebla del Río, Morón, Marchena y Coria del Río. La previsión de lluvia de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (Aemet) para el domingo 5 de enero alcanza una probabilidad del 100 %. Se pronostica en varios momentos del día.
Sevilla mantiene las previsiones Otros ayuntamientos tomarán la decisión durante la jornada de hoy. Sevilla capital, con la segunda cabalgata más antigua de España, no tiene por ahora intención de cambiar los planes.
En la capital andaluza la cabalgata la organiza el Ateneo . Fuentes de esta entidad han indicado que los planes iniciales siguen, por el momento, adelante. Son la visita del Heraldo el día 4 y la cabalgata el 5.
En municipios como Gerena nada cambia. Su cabalgata es en la mañana del 6 de enero. Se plantean qué hacer en el barrio sevillano de Triana. Allí el recorrido es el mismo día 6, pero por la tarde, cuando se espera igualmente lluvia.
Los cambios en Huelva En Huelva, ante la previsión de lluvias y vientos que podrían ser intensos el domingo en la provincia, son ya alrededor de una decena los ayuntamientos que han decidido adelantar al día 4 sus cabalgatas de Reyes, entre ellos el de la capital.
De esta forma, el Ayuntamiento ha informado de que ha cambiado toda la programación relativa a la visita de los Reyes Magos.
Para empezar, se adelanta en una hora el horario previsto para su llegada en barco, estando prevista su bienvenida el 4 de enero a las 10.30 horas en la Marina del Odiel, con la intención de celebrar esa misma tarde la Gran Cabalgata y dejar para el día siguiente, domingo 5 de enero, las visitas a hospitales y asilos en la jornada matinal y posteriormente, a partir de las 17:00 horas, la recogida oficial de cartas en el Salón de Plenos Consistorial.
Momento de la cabalgata de los Reyes Magos en Higuera de la Sierra (Huelva), considerada como una de las más antiguas de Andalucía, el año pasado. EFE/Miguel Vázquez/ARCHIVO La decisión del adelanto la han tomado también municipios de la comarca como Punta Umbría, Condado La Palma del Condado, Bollullos del Condado, Bonares, Almonte – que adelanta las de Almonte y El Rocío aunque no la de Matalascañas que estará pendiente de la evolución del tiempo-, Niebla o Hinojos.
A ellos se suman en otras comarcas las localidades de Beas, Gibraleón o la Entidad Local Autónoma de Tharsis, dependiente de Alosno.
Otros municipios como los costeros de Ayamonte, Lepe o Cartaya tomarán su decisión a lo largo del día de hoy.
Modificación de actos paralelo.
Actos paralelos El cambio en la salida de las cabalgatas provoca también modificaciones en los actos paralelos de los Reyes Magos, como en Arahal (Sevilla), donde es costumbre visitar a enfermos, asociaciones y la Residencia de Mayores Madre Encarnación, previstas por la mañana del 5 de enero, que ahora se modifica para adaptar la agenda al nuevo recorrido.
De momento, en los almacenes municipales siguen los trabajos para ultimar las carrozas y los cortejos preparan todo para salir, pendientes de las últimas órdenes de los organizadores para que todo salga conforme a lo previsto, aunque haya que cambiar el día de salida oficial.

author: @agensir
title: Iraq: card. Sako (patriarca) ha celebrato la lavanda dei piedi nell’arcidiocesi di Mosul - AgenSIR
text: Ieri il patriarca caldeo, card. Louis Raphael Sako ha celebrato la Messa in Coena Domini nel piccolo villaggio di Hazar Jot nell’Arcidiocesi di Mosul, nella chiesa di Santa Maria. Durante la liturgia ha lavato i piedi a 12 fedeli. Lo riferisce il patriarcato caldeo. “Lavare i piedi significa lavare e purificare i cuori – ha detto Mar Sako -. Gesù lavò i piedi ai suoi discepoli perché lavassero i loro cuori”. Nonostante ciò “il cuore di Giuda non venne lavato e per una manciata di soldi l’apostolo lo tradì, anteponendo il suo interesse alla fedeltà al Maestro. Anche oggi ci sono parabole di Giuda Iscariota dappertutto. L’importante è che manteniate la purezza dei vostri cuori affinché Cristo possa abitare in voi”. “Gesù – ha aggiunto Mar Sako – ha offerto suo corpo perché noi potessimo essere in Lui, per trasformarci lentamente nel suo corpo. Oggi però ci sono in mezzo a persone veramente sante e osservanti, tanti ipocriti che pregano e prendono il sacramento, ma fanno esattamente il contrario di ciò che Gesù predicava”.

author: blue News
title: CR7 spectateur, Messi impuissant: Al-Nassr étrille l'Inter Miami 6-0, dont un but de folie signé Laporte | blue News
text: Cristiano Ronaldo forfait, Lionel Messi remplaçant: Aymeric Laporte, auteur d'un lob de 60 m, a été la vedette du match amical entre Al-Nassr et l'Inter Miami, remporté haut la main 6-0 par le club saoudien, jeudi à Ryad. Le duel très attendu entre Ronaldo et Messi, 13 Ballons d'Or à eux deux, n'a pas eu lieu. Le Portugais, blessé à un mollet, n'a pu croiser son éternel rival argentin lors de la Ryad Season Cup, un tournoi amical disputé en Arabie saoudite (29 janvier- 8 février). Sur le banc au coup d'envoi, Messi n'est entré en jeu qu'à la 83e minute. Trop tard pour permettre à l'Inter Miami de remonter au score. Malgré la présence de ses anciens coéquipiers du FC Barcelone Luis Suarez, Jordi Alba et Sergio Busquets, son équipe avait déjà pris l'eau, menée 6-0 avec notamment un but exceptionnel d'Aymeric Laporte. Sur un coup franc frappé depuis sa moitié de terrain, le Franco-Espagnol a lobé le gardien de l'Inter Miami, Drake Callender, trop avancé (12e). Otavio, buteur dès la 3e minute, Talisca, auteur d'un triplé (10e, 51e sp, 73e) et Maran (68e) ont inscrit les autres buts d'Al-Nassr.

author: @wagmnews
title: Slick Travel Conditions Expected Thursday Morning
text:
Slick Travel Conditions Expected Thursday Morning By Karri Triplett Published: Dec. 12, 2024 at 5:43 PM EST | Updated: 21 hours ago Email This Link
Share on Facebook
Share on X (formerly Twitter)
Share on Pinterest
Share on LinkedIn
PRESQUE ISLE, Maine (WAGM) - Wednesday night’s rain is expected to affect travel in the county Thursday morning. The potential for this much rain in a short period of time has the county on an aerial flood watch that is in effect until tomorrow morning. The County is getting a December rainstorm. The amount of rainfall expected combined with snow melt and high winds has the potential for vehicles to hydroplane as well as the possibility of local power outages. The Aroostook Emergency Management Agency has had several meetings with local organizations preparing for the storm.
Darren Woods, Director of the Aroostook Emergency Management Agency said, “With the winds that are being projected right after the soaking rain we are anticipating some power outages. We always hope that there aren’t any, but you can’t live on hope. You have to be prepared. So, we tell people to prepare for power outages like you would any other and watch for pooling water in the roadways where there may be clogged storm drains and whatnot.”
Meteorologist Vanessa Symonick said the main concern for local travel is the potential for ponding onto the roadways and refreezing to occur. This could make for some slick travel conditions Thursday morning. “So, when we’re thinking about road conditions, and we’re thinking about the different types of precipitation, when we think about freezing rain like we dealt with earlier this morning you want to think of it as that glaze, that icy glaze. I kind of put things into perspective in the way of donuts if we’re comparing things. So, if you have that icy glaze think of it as your glazed donut, really coating everything in terms of the pavement. We’re thinking about rain, that main concern is for hydroplaning because of the ponding onto the roadways. So, even though there isn’t that slick component to it, it still is hazardous enough to create some difficult travel conditions even with warmer temperatures.” Locals can check for the latest updates on road conditions and weather alerts at wagmtv.com.
Copyright 2024 WAGM. All rights reserved.
